sect1.title: Overview
sect1.para: You will generate eclipse maven project with Junit4 from CLI and. Also you will generate jar and then you will run your application. For more information you can check examples Maven – Maven in 5 Minutes and TheNEXUS | A Community Project

listitem.para:
Coverxygen
coverxygen · PyPI
GitHub - psycofdj/coverxygen: Generate doxygen's documentation coverage report

Choose Licence
Appendix | Choose a License

sect4.title: Package Manager Windows Setup
sect4.para: We will install required application with package manager on Windows so use following script to install chocolatey and scoop

sect3.title: Pre-Commit Code Formatter Astyle Installation
sect3.para: Before each commit also with batch script we will format our code with astyle we need to install it with package manager as following script you can visit package manager web site for more details Chocolatey Software | Artistic Style 3.2.1 and https://astyle.sourceforge.net/
Astyle tool need configuration there is example configuration named astyle-options.txt
After installation and config file generation we can format our code with following script this script look for .cs extension and format related files according to configuration in astyle-options.txt

sect3.title: Doxygen and Graphviz Setup + MkDocs Material Theme
sect3.para: We will use package manager for this but also we can use several tools I prefer to use following script to install all parties, This setup also use for mkdocs material them documentation generation maybe we can use for project website generation
After doxygen installation create default doxygen file with -g option
This will create Doxyfile for us to modify. Use Doxywizard to modify file. Be sure that your output directory should be **./docs** and all warnings should be opened and warnings stop operations.

sect4.title: ReportGenerator Setup
sect4.para: We need to install reportgenerator for creation of HTML test reports, we will use choco to install visit package manager web site Chocolatey Software | ReportGenerator (Portable) - Generates reports for various code coverage tools 5.1.20

sect4.title: Github Repositoy Creation
sect4.para: First create a empty project in github and clone it to your PC,

sect4.title: Pre-Commit Action Restrictions
sect4.para: Use following pre-commit script and replace it with .git/hook/precommit

This script will check astyle-options.txt file, gitignore file, README.md file and Doxyfile is exist if not it will be terminate your commit operation. Also after astyle installation and astyle-options.txt generation it will automatically format your source code before each commit. Formatting configuration will be stored in astyle-options.txt .

sect4.title: Create .gitignore with TOPTAL API via batch script
sect4.para: Use the following script to generate .gitignore file, you can change gitignore file by changing the configuration after https://www.toptal.com/developers/gitignore/api

sect4.title: Create an Empty README.md file
sect4.para: Create and EMPTY README.md file and during project fill required parts

sect4.title: Create Default Doxyfile
sect4.para: Use following command to generate default Doxyfile if you didn't create or you can use pre-configured configuration and you can edit over this configurations. Be sure that your output directory should be **./docs** and all warnings should be opened and warnings stop operations.

sect4.title: First commit is ready, You can commit and push your work.
sect4.para: You can use gitextension to commit your work, check if you get any error than return steps and check missing parts.

sect3.title: Import Project to Eclipse
sect3.para: Use import existing maven project option to import project to Eclipse

sect3.title: Rename Files
sect3.para: Rename App.java to CalculatorApp.java and AppTest.java to CalculatorAppTest.java and Generate Calculator.java and CalculatorTest.java
Generate test with add new unit test feature in Eclipse

sect3.title: Generate Project Site Files

listitem.para:
site.xml
resources
images
banner.png
logo.png
markdown
overview.md

sect3.para: You can use files in project

sect3.title: Build the Project
sect3.para: Enter pom.xml root folder and run following command to test and generate jar file

sect3.title: Run Project
sect3.para: You can run application by specify the Main function

sect2.title: Run Maven Site
sect2.para: Use CTRL+C to cancel from console
This has code coverage and documentation coverage reports also
